It was already <lb n="c56-0045__main__9"/>one in the <seg sID="C10_app19-fMS"/> morning, <seg eID="C10_app19-fMS"/> the rain pattered <lb n="c56-0045__main__10"/>dismally against the <seg sID="C10_app21-fMS"/> window panes, & <lb n="c56-0045__main__11"/>my candle was nearly burnt out, <seg eID="C10_app21-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app22-fMS"/> when <seg eID="C10_app22-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__12"/>by the glimmer of the <seg sID="C10_app24-fMS"/> half <w ana="start"/>extinguish<lb n="c56-0045__main__13"/>ed<w ana="end"/> light <seg eID="C10_app24-fMS"/> I saw the dull yellow eye of <lb n="c56-0045__main__14"/>the creature <seg sID="C10_app26-fMS"/> open.—It <seg eID="C10_app26-fMS"/> breathed hard, <lb n="c56-0045__main__15"/>and a convulsive motion agitated <lb n="c56-0045__main__16"/>its limbs. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg sID="C10_app28-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__main__d5e9661">But how</del> How can I describe my <seg eID="C10_app28-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app29-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__18"/>emotion <seg eID="C10_app29-fMS"/> at this <seg sID="C10_app31-fMS"/> catastrophe; <seg eID="C10_app31-fMS"/> or how <w ana="start"/>deli<lb n="c56-0045__main__19"/>neate<w ana="end"/> the wretch whom with such <lb n="c56-0045__main__20"/>infinite pains and care I had endeavoured <lb n="c56-0045__main__21"/>to <seg sID="C10_app33-fMS"/> form. <seg eID="C10_app33-fMS"/> His limbs were in <seg sID="C10_app35-fMS"/> proportion <seg eID="C10_app35-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__22"/>and I had selected his features <seg sID="C10_app37-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__main__d5e9680">h</del> as <seg eID="C10_app37-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app38-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__23"/><mod sID="c56-0045__main__d5e9685"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__main__d5e9687">handsome</del> <mdel>.</mdel> <anchor xml:id="c56-0045.01"/><lb n="c56-0045__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9698"/><mod sID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9700"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9702">handsome</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9705"/>beautiful. <seg eID="C10_app38-fMS"/>

His <seg sID="C10_app41-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0045__main__24"/><mod sID="c56-0045__main__d5e9723"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__main__d5e9725">dun</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0045.02"/><lb n="c56-0045__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9734"/>yellow <seg eID="C10_app41-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9734"/><mod eID="c56-0045__main__d5e9723"/>skin scarcely covered the work of <lb n="c56-0045__main__25"/>muscles and arteries beneath; his hair <lb n="c56-0045__main__26"/>was <seg sID="C10_app43-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0045__main__d5e9743"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0045__main__d5e9745"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0045.03">^</metamark> <lb n="c56-0045__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9754"/>of a lustrous <seg eID="C10_app43-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app44-fMS"/> black <seg eID="C10_app44-fMS"/> &<sga-add eID="c56-0045__left_margin__d5e9754"/><sga-add eID="c56-0045__main__d5e9745"/><mod eID="c56-0045__main__d5e9743"/> <seg sID="C10_app46-fMS"/> flowing and <seg eID="C10_app46-fMS"/> his teeth of a pearly <seg sID="C10_app48-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>white<lb n="c56-0045__main__27"/>ness<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C10_app48-fMS"/> but these <seg sID="C10_app50-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>luxurianc<sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0045__main__d5e9767"/>i<sga-add eID="c56-0045__main__d5e9767"/>es<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C10_app50-fMS"/> only <seg sID="C10_app52-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0045__main__d5e9770">fomed</del> <lb n="c56-0045__main__28"/>formed a more horrid contrast with <lb n="c56-0045__main__29"/>his <seg eID="C10_app52-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app53-fMS"/> watry eyes <seg eID="C10_app53-fMS"/> that seemed almost of <lb n="c56-0045__main__30"/>the same colour as the dun white <lb n="c56-0045__main__31"/>sockets in which they were set, <lb n="c56-0046__main__1"/>his shrivelled <seg sID="C10_app55-fMS"/> complexion <seg eID="C10_app55-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app56-fMS"/> and <seg eID="C10_app56-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app57-fMS"/> strait <seg eID="C10_app57-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__2"/>black lips. <seg sID="C10_app59-fMS"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__3"/>The different accidents of life are <lb n="c56-0046__main__4"/>not so changeable as the feelings of <w ana="start"/>hu<lb n="c56-0046__main__5"/>man<w ana="end"/> nature. I had worked hard for <lb n="c56-0046__main__6"/>nearly two <seg eID="C10_app59-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app60-fMS"/> years <seg eID="C10_app60-fMS"/> for the sole purpose <lb n="c56-0046__main__7"/>of infusing <seg sID="C10_app62-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0046__main__d5e9810">f</del> life into an inanimate <lb n="c56-0046__main__8"/>body. For this I had deprived myself of <lb n="c56-0046__main__9"/>rest and <seg eID="C10_app62-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app63-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0046__main__d5e9821">heath</del> health. I had desired <lb n="c56-0046__main__10"/>it with an ardour that far <w ana="start"/>exceed<sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9826"/>ed<sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9826"/><w ana="end"/><lb n="c56-0046__main__11"/> moderation; but now that I had <seg eID="C10_app63-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app64-fMS"/> <w ana="start"/>succeed<lb n="c56-0046__main__12"/>ed<w ana="end"/> these dreams vanished <seg eID="C10_app64-fMS"/> and breathless <lb n="c56-0046__main__13"/>horror and disgust filled my heart. <seg sID="C10_app66-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__14"/>Unable <mod sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9843"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9845"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9845"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9851"/>to endure<sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9851"/><mod eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9843"/> the aspect of the <mod sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9855"/><del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0046__main__d5e9857">creature</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9860"/>being <sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9860"/><mod eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9855"/> <seg eID="C10_app66-fMS"/> I <lb n="c56-0046__main__15"/>had created, I rushed out of the <seg sID="C10_app68-fMS"/> room <seg eID="C10_app68-fMS"/> and <seg sID="C10_app70-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__16"/><mod sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9868"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0046__main__d5e9870">remained</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9873"/>continued <seg eID="C10_app70-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9873"/><mod eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9868"/>a long time traversing my <seg sID="C10_app72-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__17"/>bed chamber <seg eID="C10_app72-fMS"/> unable to compose my <lb n="c56-0046__main__18"/>mind to sleep. At <seg sID="C10_app74-fMS"/> lenght <mod sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9882"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9889"/>l <sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9889"/><mod eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9882"/> assitude <seg eID="C10_app74-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__19"/>succeeded to the tumult I had before <seg sID="C10_app76-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__20"/>endured, <seg eID="C10_app76-fMS"/> and I threw myself on <seg sID="C10_app78-fMS"/> my <seg eID="C10_app78-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__21"/>bed in my <seg sID="C10_app80-fMS"/> clothes <seg eID="C10_app80-fMS"/> endeavouring to seek <lb n="c56-0046__main__22"/>a <seg sID="C10_app82-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0046__main__d5e9902">feew</del> few moments of <seg eID="C10_app82-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app83-fMS"/> forgetfullness. <seg eID="C10_app83-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__23"/>But it was in <seg sID="C10_app85-fMS"/> vain; <seg eID="C10_app85-fMS"/> I <seg sID="C10_app87-fMS"/> slept <seg eID="C10_app87-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app88-fMS"/> indeed <seg eID="C10_app88-fMS"/> but <lb n="c56-0046__main__24"/>I was disturbed by the wildest <seg sID="C10_app90-fMS"/> dreams– <seg eID="C10_app90-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__25"/>I <seg sID="C10_app92-fMS"/> saw Elizabeth <mod sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9914"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9916"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg eID="C10_app92-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9916"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0046__main__d5e9922"/>in the bloom of <seg sID="C10_app94-fMS"/> health <sga-add eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9922"/><mod eID="c56-0046__main__d5e9914"/> <seg eID="C10_app94-fMS"/> walking in the streets of <seg sID="C10_app96-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__26"/>Ingolstadt; <seg eID="C10_app96-fMS"/> delighted & <seg sID="C10_app98-fMS"/> surprised <seg eID="C10_app98-fMS"/> I embraced <seg sID="C10_app100-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0046__main__27"/>her <seg eID="C10_app100-fMS"/> but as I imprinted the first kiss <lb n="c56-0046__main__28"/>on her <seg sID="C10_app102-fMS"/> lips <seg eID="C10_app102-fMS"/> they became <seg sID="C10_app104-fMS"/> lurid <seg eID="C10_app104-fMS"/> with <lb n="c56-0046__main__29"/>the hue of death; her features appeared <lb n="c56-0047__main__1"/>to <seg sID="C10_app106-fMS"/> change <seg eID="C10_app106-fMS"/> and I thought that I held <lb n="c56-0047__main__2"/>the corpse of my dead mother in my <seg sID="C10_app108-fMS"/> arms <mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9947"/> <mdel>,</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9951"/>: <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9951"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9947"/><lb n="c56-0047__main__3"/><mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9957"/> <mdel>a</mdel> <seg eID="C10_app108-fMS"/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9961"/>A <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9961"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9957"/>shroud <seg sID="C10_app111-fMS"/> envolepped <seg eID="C10_app111-fMS"/> her <seg sID="C10_app113-fMS"/> form <seg eID="C10_app113-fMS"/> & I saw <lb n="c56-0047__main__4"/>the <seg sID="C10_app115-fMS"/> grave worms <seg eID="C10_app115-fMS"/> crawling in the folds of <lb n="c56-0047__main__5"/>the <seg sID="C10_app117-fMS"/> flannel; <seg eID="C10_app117-fMS"/> I started <seg sID="C10_app119-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9970"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9972"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9972"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9978"/>from my sleep<sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9978"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9970"/> with <seg eID="C10_app119-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app120-fMS"/> horror, <seg eID="C10_app120-fMS"/> a <seg sID="C10_app122-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0047__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0047__main__d5e9984">when I saw</del> cold dew covered my <seg eID="C10_app122-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app123-fMS"/> forehead <seg eID="C10_app123-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0047__main__7"/>my teeth <seg sID="C10_app125-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0047__main__d5e9990">ah</del> chattered <seg eID="C10_app125-fMS"/> and every limb <seg sID="C10_app127-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0047__main__8"/><mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e9995"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0047__main__d5e9997">was</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10000"/>became <seg eID="C10_app127-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app128-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10000"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e9995"/> convul <mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10004"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10011"/>s <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10011"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10004"/> ed, <seg eID="C10_app128-fMS"/> when, by the dim and <lb n="c56-0047__main__9"/>yellow light of the <seg sID="C10_app130-fMS"/> moon <seg eID="C10_app130-fMS"/> as it forced <lb n="c56-0047__main__10"/>its way through the <seg sID="C10_app132-fMS"/> window shutters, <seg eID="C10_app132-fMS"/> I <lb n="c56-0047__main__11"/>beheld the <seg sID="C10_app134-fMS"/> wretch — the <seg eID="C10_app134-fMS"/> miserable <lb n="c56-0047__main__12"/>monster whom I had <seg sID="C10_app136-fMS"/> created; <seg eID="C10_app136-fMS"/> he <seg sID="C10_app138-fMS"/> hel <mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10024"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10031"/>d <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10031"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10024"/><lb n="c56-0047__main__13"/>up <seg eID="C10_app138-fMS"/> the <seg sID="C10_app140-fMS"/> curtain, <seg eID="C10_app140-fMS"/> and his <seg sID="C10_app142-fMS"/> eyes <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10037"/>— <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10037"/>; <seg eID="C10_app142-fMS"/> if eyes <lb n="c56-0047__main__14"/>they may be called, <seg sID="C10_app144-fMS"/> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10043"/>— <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10043"/> were fixed on <seg eID="C10_app144-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app145-fMS"/> me–His <seg eID="C10_app145-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0047__main__15"/>jaws <seg sID="C10_app147-fMS"/> opened <seg eID="C10_app147-fMS"/> and he muttered <seg sID="C10_app149-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0047__main__d5e10048"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10050"/>in <sga-add eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10050"/> </del> some <seg eID="C10_app149-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app150-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0047__main__d5e10054"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0047__main__d5e10056">words</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0047.01"/><lb n="c56-0047__left_margin__1"/>inarticulate <seg eID="C10_app150-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C10_app151-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0047__left_margin__2"/>sounds <seg eID="C10_app151-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0047.02"/><mod eID="c56-0047__main__d5e10054"/><lb n="c56-0047__main__16"/>while a grin wrinkled his cheeks.
